simplesocial.server

Class OnlineUsers

  • java.lang.Object
    • simplesocial.server.OnlineUsers

  • public class OnlineUsers
extends Object
    Implements a database of all SimpleSocial Users that are online. For each User, stores a record containing the User, its authorization token, the login time, and its SocketAddress.
    Author:
    Francesco Landolfi

      OnlineUsers constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • setLogDuration

        public static void setLogDuration(long logDuration)
        Sets the duration of the log. After that duration, the User must login again on the server.
        Parameters:
        logDuration - the duration of the login, in milliseconds

      • setLogDuration

        public static void setLogDuration(String text)
        Sets the duration of the log. After that duration, the User must login again on the server.

        The format accepted by this method is the ISO-8601 standard (PnDTnHnMn.nS)

        Parameters:
        text - the duration of the login, in ISO-8601 format (PnDTnHnMn.nS)
        See Also:
        Duration.parse(CharSequence)

      • getLogDurationString

        public static String getLogDurationString()
        Returns the login duration, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the login duration, in milliseconds

      • getLogDurationMillis

        public static long getLogDurationMillis()
        Returns the login duration, in PnDTnHnMn.nS format (ISO-8601 standard).
        Returns:
        the login duration, in PnDTnHnMn.nS format
        See Also:
        Duration.toString()

      • login

        public int login(User user,
                 SocketAddress address)
        Logs user in with the given address.
        Parameters:
        user - the User to log in
        address - the User's SocketAddress
        Returns:
        User's oAuth, or -1 if an error occurs

      • logout

        public void logout(User user)
        Logs user out.
        Parameters:
        user - the User to log out

      • logout

        public void logout(String username)
        Logs the User with the given username out.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the User to log out

      • isLogged

        public User isLogged(String username,
                     int oAuth)
        Checks if a User is logged given its username and oAuth. Returns the User if it's logged, null otherwise.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the User
        oAuth - the User's oAuth
        Returns:
        the User if it's logged, null otherwise

      • setAlive

        public void setAlive(String username)
        Sets the User with the given username alive (has responded to the last Keep-Alive signal).
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the User to set alive

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive(String username)
        Checks if the User with the given username is alive (has responded to the last Keep-Alive signal).
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the User
        Returns:
        true if the User is alive, false otherwise

      • updateList

        public List<String> updateList()
        Removes all the records of the Users that are not alive (have not responded to the last Keep-Alive signal). Sets all other Users not alive. Returns the List of the removed Users.
        Returns:
        the List of the removed Users

      • getUserAddress

        public SocketAddress getUserAddress(String username)
        Returns the SocketAddress of the User with the given username.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the User
        Returns:
        a SocketAddress if the User is online, null\ otherwise

      • getUserAddress

        public SocketAddress getUserAddress(User user)
        Returns the SocketAddress of the given User user.
        Parameters:
        user - the User
        Returns:
        a SocketAddress if the User is online, null\ otherwise
